code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState=[{title:"first expense item",amount:23,date:"first expense date"}];var expenseSlicer=createSlice({name:"expenses",initialState:initialState,reducers:{addExpense:function addExpense(state,action){state.push(action.payload);console.log("addExpense method is invoked");},deleteExpense:function deleteExpense(){console.log("deleteExpense is invoked");}}});var expenseReducer=expenseSlicer.reducer;var _expenseSlicer$action=expenseSlicer.actions,addExpense=_expenseSlicer$action.addExpense,deleteExpense=_expenseSlicer$action.deleteExpense;export{addExpense,deleteExpense};export default expenseReducer;
